section.title: Detailed Description
section.para: The Encoder class represents an encoder device.
This class inherits from the VirtEncoder class and provides additional functionality for initializing and reading the encoder.
Definition at line 17 of file Encoder.h.

section.title: action()

para.para: Representing the possible flags for the encoder.

formalpara.title: Returns
formalpara.para:
EB_FLAGS_T can have the following values:
EB_TURN: Represents the flag for turning action.
EB_TURN_L: Represents the flag for left turning action.
EB_TURN_R: Represents the flag for right turning action.
EB_NONE: Represents the flag for no action.

section.title: setEncISR()

para.para: Set the encoder's interrupt service routine.

entry.para: true to use the ISR, false otherwise

note.title: Note
note.para: Argument "use" by default is true because name of this function means that it is used to set/activate the ISR.

section.title: tick()[1/3]
